long_description: A great value for hiking and general use, the REI KU 8 x 22 binoculars sport a compact, lightweight and water-resistant design that's easy to slip in a pocket and bring on your next outdoor adventure. Multicoated lenses reduce reflection to help preserve light transmission and image contrast. Bak4 prisms enhance brightness. Fold-down eye cups and 10mm eye relief accommodate glasses. Rubber armor provides weather resistance and comfortable grip. The REI KU 8 x 22 binoculars come with a case, neck strap and lens cloth.
short_description: A great value for hiking and general use, the REI KU 8 x 22 binoculars sport a compact, lightweight and water-resistant design that's easy to slip in a pocket and bring on your next outdoor adventure.
